How to deal with retrospectives

Dmitry Bebriss

November 11, 2023

Management and leadership
About ToolsTrek

I‚Äôm here with you too

My colleagues at Toolstrek and I have tried a lot of ways to involve the team in conversation during retro, and today I‚Äôd like to share some useful tools that will be helpful in different stages of the meeting:

    üßéRetromat could help your team to warm up. Most software developers I‚Äôve ever seen are not extroverts and this means they need some time to get ready to share their real thoughts.
Please follow this link to start using an awesome tool for discussion preheating¬†https://retromat.org/en/
    üßçMake your drop-add-keep-improve (DAKI) cycle more engaging with amazing Agile Retrospectives, Planning Poker, Meetings & Team Health for Jira by devsamurai . It‚Äôs nice looking comfortable to use online tool which is especially good for distributed teams
    üèÉ And obviously - Jira. Don‚Äôt forget to create tasks for the upcoming sprint following all the insights made during the retrospective
These three tools will help you conduct well-structured, comfortable, and engaging sprint retrospectives!
